description: A floating restaurant ship shaped like a fish, owned and operated by Zeff. Known throughout East Blue for its excellent cuisine and fighting cooks.

keyEvents.title: Krieg Announces Plan to Seize Baratie
keyEvents.description: Don Krieg reveals his intention to take the Baratie as his new flagship after destroying his current ship.

keyEvents.title: Confrontation Between Zeff and Krieg
keyEvents.description: Inside the Baratie, Zeff confronts Krieg about his failed Grand Line expedition and Krieg demands Zeff's logbook.

keyEvents.title: Mihawk Arrives at Baratie
keyEvents.description: Dracule Mihawk appears at the Baratie, having followed Krieg's fleet from the Grand Line, and destroys the flagship.

culturalSignificance: Famous throughout East Blue as a premier dining destination with a unique concept of fighting cooks who protect their restaurant.
